verses.1: Topa in Jakob hehpihin Israel teelkik dinga, amaute pen a gam uh ah koihkik ding hi. Khual mite in amaute pawlin Jakob innkuan bel ding uh hi.
verses.2: Israel mite in amaute manin amauʼ gamah ciahpih ding uh a, Topaʼ gam sungah amaute pen sila numei sila pasal dingin nei ding uh hi. Amaute a man ngei mite pen tu-in amaute in leh mat ding uh a, amaute a nengniam ngei mite tungah tu-in ukna nei ding uh hi.
verses.3: A haksa nasep hong kisepsakna, gimna le lungkhamna panin Topa in note tungah tawldamna hong piak ciangin,
verses.4: Babylon kumpipa tungah hih zahkona kam na zang ding uh a, “Kumpi gilopa puk ta a, amah in kuamah nengniam zo nawn lo ding!
verses.5: Tawlnga loin mihingte satna-in a kizang, hehna tawh minamte ukin nakpi takin a bawlsia, migiloteʼ ciangkhut le gam ukteʼ kumpi ciangkhut, Topa in kuaitan khinta hi.
verses.7: Leitung khempeuh tawlnga-in gamdai takin om ta uh a, amaute in la sa-in kiko uh hi.
verses.8: Taksing kungte na tungah lungdamin, Lebanon mual taamtak singkungte in, ‘Nang hong kiniamkoih khit a kipanin kote a phuk dingin kuamah hong pai nawn kei,’ ci uh hi.
verses.9: “Nang na pai suk ciangin a hong dawntuah dingin Leinuai-a misite kihanthawn a, nangmah a hong hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuaksak hi. A minamteʼ kumpite khempeuh amauʼ kumpi tokhom panin hong ding uh hi.
verses.10: Amaute in nang hong hopihin, ‘Nang zong kote mah bangin na thahat kei hi. Kote mah na bang ta hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.
verses.11: Nangma harp lasakna awte, nangma liatna khempeuh Leinuai ah kipaipih suk hi. Thante pen nangma delhphah hi a, thante pen nangma silh ahi hi.
verses.12: “Nang Khuavakʼ ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niamkoih pa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphuk pai ahi hiam?
verses.13: Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantungah ka kah to ding hi. A sangna mun, Pasianʼ aksiteʼ tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih dinga, leilu lam pek a kikhopna mual tungah ka tu ding hi.
verses.14: Meiiteʼ tung pekah ka kah to dinga, Sangpen pa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
verses.15: Ahih hangin nang pen Leinuai thuk penna Leihawm sungah hong kikoih suk ding hi.
verses.16: “Nangmah hong mu mite in nang hong en gega-in, nangma thu lungngai dedu ding uh a, ‘Hih mipa pen leitung a liingsak pa, kumpi gamte a lok gawp pa,
verses.17: leitung pen sehnel gam suaksakin, khuapite a susia pa, thong sungah a kikhum mite inn ah a ciahsak lopa hih pa hi lo ahi hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
verses.18: “Minam dangteʼ kumpite khempeuh amau hankhuk sung ciat uh ah a minthangin lum uh hi.
verses.19: Ahih hangin nang pen namsau tawh a kithat misi a uihte, Suanghawmpi sunga a pai sukte, khe tawh a kisikcip si luang hawmte bangin, na hankhuk pua lamah hong kilawn khia hi.
verses.20: Nangmah in na gam susia-in, nangma mihingte that khin na hih manin, nang pen amaute tawh hong kivui khawm lo ding hi. Siatna a bawlpaʼ suanlekhakteʼ min kilo ngei nawn kei tahen!
verses.21: Amaute khangto loin leitung a neih loh nading le leitung maitang teng khuapite tawh a kidimsak loh nadingin amauʼ pateʼ mawhna hangin a tateʼ kithah nading piang tahen,” na ci ding uh hi.
verses.22: Vanglian Topa in, “Amauteʼ lang khat ah ka pang dinga, Babylon min le a om lai miteʼ tate le suanlekhakte ka susia ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
verses.23: Saphulipteʼ om nadingin tua khuapi bawlin, bualtui ka suaksak dinga, siatna munphiah tawh ka phiat khia siang ding hi,” Vanglian Topa in ci hi.
verses.24: Vanglian Topa kiciam khin a, “Ka geel sa bangin piang dinga, ka ngimna sa bangin kip ding hi.
verses.25: Keimah in ka gam sungah Assiria mite ka susia dinga, ka mual tungah ka sikcip ding hi. Ka miteʼ tung panin Assiria-teʼ hakkol amauteʼ liangko panin Assiria-teʼ van gik kia khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.26: Hih ngimna pen leitung buppi adingin a kingim ahi hi. Hih ka khut pen minam khempeuh gimpiak nadingin a kizan ahi hi.
verses.27: Vanglian Topa in ngim khin ahih manin kua in phiat zo ding ahi hiam? Ama khut kizan khin ahih manin kua in kaitonkik zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.28: Kumpi Ahaz a sih kumin thu hong tung a,
verses.29: “Filistia mi khempeuh aw, note hong kisatna ciangkhut a kitan manin lungdam kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh singbul panin a sel a om bangin, gulpi a sih khit ciangin a siahuai zaw gul gunei hong om dinga, tuate pen a leng thei gulpi hong hi ding uh hi.
verses.30: Mizawngte in keima gankhahna sungah an ne ding uh a, a cimawhte lungnuam takin lum hithiat ding uh hi. Ahih hangin no Filistia mite, kialpi tawh kong that dinga, a suakta kha a omlaite keimah in ka that ding hi.
verses.31: “Filistia khuapi kongpite aw, nakpi takin kap un; khuapite aw, kiko un. Filistia mi khempeuh aw, lau-in liing un! Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin galkap honteʼ hong paina leivui khu hong kitung a, tua galkapte a meidawi khat beek om lo hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.32: Filistia mite in a hong sawl kamtaite mi khatpeuh in bangci dawn ding ahi hiam? “ Topa in Zion kipsak khin a, gimna a thuak ama mite in tua sungah bukna mu uh hi,” ci-in a dawng ding uh hi.
